title: Champion vibrating! fix it ! its annoying.
body:
Hi, been posting this a couple time on the forum since the first day of patch 6.23, nothing has been fixed and almost nobody talk about this anymore when there was alot of people talking about this before..

Under camera locked , and less on not locked if you are on v-sync 60 fps cap. the champion and the hp bar is vibrating while you are walking and it's really annoying i was hoping riot to fix it during 6.23 , nothing then during 6.24 nothing...

please..

replies.body:
Can also confirm of getting this issue as well recently. Under the locked camera, the champions tend to vibrate and have a delay in movement throughout a game on Summoner's Rift. Have never experienced this issue until this patch and the patch beforehand where the issue first sprung up. 

Hopefully this issue can be resolved - I'm not able to get a recording myself; however, hopefully another can provide the evidence as it's extremely irritating. x.x
Ooof, that sounds pretty weird! Can you provide a recording of this happening so I can look into it further?

replies.poster: u m é b ó s h i
replies.body: I have also had this issue since 6.23.  Very frustrating, if anyone at Riot is listening pls help us.
